Class DoctorCSVOperator

java.lang.Object
CSV.CSVoperator
CSV.DoctorCSVOperator
public class DoctorCSVOperator extends CSVoperator
This class provides methods for reading, writing, updating, and deleting records in a CSV file specifically related to doctor data. It extends the abstract class CSVoperator.

The CSV file is expected to contain doctor data, and this class allows operations like:

  • Reading a specific doctor's data by ID.
  • Adding a new doctor record.
  • Updating specific fields for a doctor record.
  • Deleting a doctor record.

This class assumes the CSV file format follows a specific structure where columns represent various data points such as doctor ID, name, schedule, etc.

  • Constructor Details

    • DoctorCSVOperator

      public DoctorCSVOperator()
      Constructor that initializes the file path for the CSV file. The default file path is set to "./Doctor_List.csv".

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public ArrayList<String> readFile(String id, int role)
      Reads the CSV file and retrieves the data for a specific doctor based on the given ID.
      Specified by:
      readFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the doctor whose data is to be retrieved.
      role - The role of the user (not used in this implementation but can be extended for role-based data retrieval).
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the doctor's data, or an empty list if the doctor is not found.

    • addLineToFile

      public boolean addLineToFile(List<String> dataAdd)
      Adds a new line to the CSV file with the data for a new doctor.
      Specified by:
      addLineToFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      dataAdd - A list containing the new doctor's data.
      Returns:
      true if the new line is successfully added; false otherwise.

    • changeSpecificInformation

      public boolean changeSpecificInformation(String id, ArrayList<Integer> indexChanges, ArrayList<String> changes)
      Changes specific information for a doctor in the CSV file. The fields to be updated are identified by their column indices, and the new values are provided in the changes list.
      Specified by:
      changeSpecificInformation in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the doctor whose information is to be changed.
      indexChanges - A list of indices representing the columns to be updated.
      changes - A list of new values for the specified columns.
      Returns:
      true if the information was successfully updated; false otherwise.

    • deleteSpecificLine

      public boolean deleteSpecificLine(String id)
      Deletes the record of a specific doctor from the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      deleteSpecificLine in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the doctor to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the record was successfully deleted; false otherwise.

    • splitCommaCSVLine

      public String[] splitCommaCSVLine(String line)
      Splits a CSV line into its individual tokens, considering quoted fields. This method ensures that commas inside quoted strings do not split the field.
      Overrides:
      splitCommaCSVLine in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV line to be split.
      Returns:
      An array of strings, where each element represents a token (column) from the CSV line.
